channel.title: Sacramento on Police Overhead
channel.description: Recent content in Sacramento on Police Overhead

item.title: Sacramento County Sheriff - March 2021
item.description: In March 2021, Sacramento County Sheriff flew 6 aircraft for a total of 173 hours. There were 136 flights. The longest was 3.67 hours

item.title: Sacramento County Sheriff - February 2021
item.description: In February 2021, Sacramento County Sheriff flew 5 aircraft for a total of 129 hours. There were 86 flights. The longest was 3.86 hours

item.title: Sacramento County Sheriff - January 2021
item.description: In January 2021, Sacramento County Sheriff flew 6 aircraft for a total of 122 hours. There were 89 flights. The longest was 4.40 hours

item.title: Sacramento County Sheriff - November 2020
item.description: In November 2020, Sacramento County Sheriff flew 5 aircraft for a total of 145 hours. There were 105 flights. The longest was 4.40 hours

item.title: Sacramento County Sheriff - October 2020
item.description: In October 2020, Sacramento County Sheriff flew 6 aircraft for a total of 159 hours. There were 113 flights. The longest was 4.28 hours
